movie.title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
movie.description_intro: Batô is a living cyborg. His whole body, even his arms and legs, are entirely man-made. What only remains are traces of his brain and the memories of a woman. In an era when the boundary between humans and machines has become infinitely vague, Humans have forgotten that they are humans. This is the debauchery of the lonesome ghost of a man, who nevertheless seeks to retain humanity. Innocence... Is what life is.
movie.description_full: Batô is a living cyborg. His whole body, even his arms and legs, are entirely man-made. What only remains are traces of his brain and the memories of a woman. In an era when the boundary between humans and machines has become infinitely vague, Humans have forgotten that they are humans. This is the debauchery of the lonesome ghost of a man, who nevertheless seeks to retain humanity. Innocence... Is what life is.

cast.name: Roger Craig Smith
cast.character_name: Sect. 9 Briefing Voice / Yamadori Transport Pilot

movies.title: Nightmare
movies.summary: A mental-patient, who is troubled with horrible nightmares, has escaped from his hospital. Now on the streets he can't help killing innocent people. But there is one family he is more than interested in and when he tries to kill them, he finds that it's not that easy.

movies.title: The Trust
movies.summary: Waters and Stone are two nobody police officers who work in the evidence room of the Las Vegas Police Department. When Stone discovers an unusually high bail receipt in connection to a drug bust, the two friends set in motion a plan to find the source of the money.
movies.description_full: Waters and Stone are two nobody police officers who work in the evidence room of the Las Vegas Police Department. When Stone discovers an unusually high bail receipt in connection to a drug bust, the two friends set in motion a plan to find the source of the money.

movies.title: Love Surreal
movies.summary: A visionary and artistic young woman finds her love torn between her imaginary boyfriend and a real boy from one of her classes.
movies.description_full: A visionary and artistic young woman finds her love torn between her imaginary boyfriend and a real boy from one of her classes.
movies.synopsis: A visionary and artistic young woman finds her love torn between her imaginary boyfriend and a real boy from one of her classes.

movies.title: House of 1,000 Dolls
movies.summary: When a vacationing couple in Tangiers run into an old friend there, they discover that he is searching for his missing girlfriend who has been kidnapped by an international gang of white slavers. Nader investigates but before he can come up with anything, his friend is murdered. Meanwhile, nightclub magician Price and his mentalist partner continue their nefarious activities--they hypnotize and kidnap young women for the white slavers, and spirit them to the "House of 1000 Dolls."
